comments: This app is amazing. I love Barry's voice, its very calm, clear and soothing to listen too. I love the SOS section. I listen to this app every night in bed. It has helped me so much with my panic attacks and anxiety reducing the impacts to managing my Diabetes. I have highly recommended this app to my doctor, friends and my psychologist to help other people in my local community of regional Sydney Australia. A huge thank you to the Dare team :)

I must say that it's a great app and great initiative by the team , we live in a busy world n everyone is busy with themselves , but anxiety , crisis , depression are not rare , n even our dear ones sometimes do not constantly have the time to listen to our worries n be there for us , so this is where help like this is very important , i listened 4-5 audios n I m already feeling calm , n from now on I m gonna just put this on n drive away my anxiety n fears , I think it will be possible , thanku

Amazing App to help you conquer anxiety! Barry has a soothing voice and his audios are outstanding! I am so happy that I stumbled on this app. The content is extensive and super helpful. The Deep Release under Anxiety Relief is my favorite to truly feel peace and calm. Try it out!! You won't regret it.

I have extreme anxiety and panic attacks. This app has been amazing! Ive never felt so much peace and confidence in myself in handling anxiety as i do with this app. It has allowed me to accept my anxiety and beat it through meditation, acceptance, courses and building self confidence. It has allowed me to realize what ive been using as crutches and how to slowly wean myself off of them and realize i am my own safe place. The crutches hinder me and dont help me. And i feel much happier and free
I like that I can listen to the stories on loop for free. I love the SOS section that can talk someone through a panic attack. For free!

title: Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression
description:
The app includes antistress yoga poses and asanas that will help you get rid of stress, depression, fear and anxiety. This app improve your mood, health, relax you.

There are enough stress factors around each of us, from a crush in the subway to difficulties in learning, work, family. Modern man needs immunity to the daily problems and inspiration to solve them. One of the most effective ways to handle stress and depression is yoga. Coming from the East, the practice has covered almost all the countries of the world. Yoga classes were acknowledged to be effective at the UN level. Yoga is loved by stars such as Madonna, Sting, Keanu Reeves, David Duchovny, Charlize Theron.

Do you think that everything effective is expensive? Not at all: trainings, including meditation poses and exercises stretching muscles today can be performed for free. All that you spend - is a few minutes to install the mobile application "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression".

The application contains:
1. Clearly demonstrated yoga asanas that can be easily performed after the instructor
2. Known trainers advices on how to do the exercises 
3. Information block with explanation, how the yoga against stress and anxiety works
4. Light music accompaniment for a better relaxation
5. Step-by-step trainings, leading from simple things (deep breathing, smooth muscle stretching) to complex ones ( "Lotus" and other well-known yoga poses)

App "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression" is yoga for beginners following postures:
1. Shavasana.
2. Ardha Chakrasana.
3. Apanasana.
4. Pavan Muktasana (left).
5. Pavan Muktasana (right).
6. Supta Padangusthasana (right).
7. Supta Padangusthasana (left).
8. Supta Matsiendrasana (right).
9. Supta Matsyendrasana (left).
10. Supta Matsyendrasana.
11. Halasana.
12. Karnapidasana.
13. Matsiasana.
14. Supta Baddha Konasana.

Training will give you not only the flexibility of muscles. You will have the ability to quickly restore energy balance. Antistress yoga for relaxation will gently remove the irritation and fatigue of a hard day.

Reminding you, "Yoga for Relief of Anxiety, Stress and Depression" app is absolutely free. Internal refresh, calmness, cheerfulness, flexibility and with zero cost. The app is fully universal, so it can be used by all those who are often exposed to stress: students, athletes, young parents. Yoga is also helpful to representatives of professions subject to overstrain: office workers, businessmen, managers.

All you need is 15-20 minutes a day, calm atmosphere, small rubber or textile mat and comfortable clothes. No tedious trips to the gym - you train at convenient time and in a convenient location at home, in a hotel, in nature or in the office during a break. Very soon you will find an appropriate balance of loads and meditation for yourself. Practicing anti-stress yoga for relaxation, you will notice that you have become much less subjected to daily stress, act calmly and efficiently.

Proved: Yoga against anxiety is one of the most effective means of fighting stress factors of the 21st century. Traditional options for mental relaxation are going to the cinema, restaurant, etc., provide only a short-time effect. While yoga is a whole philosophy of environmentally friendly, wise and joyful life. That is why the whole world is talking about the effectiveness of yoga against stress. In addition, this facility is available to everyone, as is the case with our free mobile app. We have carefully collected everything that yoga against anxiety has to offer, and presented in the most convenient form.

title: The Depression Project
description:
With over 1,000,000 social media followers and their posts, articles and messages having been viewed over 2.5 BILLION times, The Depression Project is at the forefront of supporting people who struggle with depression. Now, in their first depression app, you can easily access all of their uplifting, encouraging, informative resources in one place – as well as exclusive content only available on the app.
 
A few of the depression resources you’ll have one-click access to include:
 
- TO HELP YOU UNDERSTAND DEPRESSION OR TO NOT FEEL ALONE: Our social media posts have been viewed over 2 BILLION times, and in this app, we’ve curated some of our most popular ones in such a way as to help you better understand depression if you’ve never struggled with it before, or to help you feel more alone if you do battle depression.
 
- DEPRESSION TREATMENT & RELIEF: You’ll have instant access to our library of articles to help you deal with negative thinking, worrying thoughts, and other issues commonly associated with depression.
 
- DEPRESSION IS A LIAR: In this bestselling memoir with 500+ 5 star reviews on Amazon, Depression Project co-founder Danny Baker shares his struggle and eventual recovery from depression. And, since October of 2019, it’s been made available for free to everyone in The Depression Project’s community :)
 
- YOUR VERY OWN “DEPRESSION LETTER”: In this app, you’ll have one-click access to our extremely popular “depression letter” – which you can personalize and then use to help your loved ones understand what you’re going through, and to explain what they can do to help.
 
- WHAT GRADE IS YOUR DEPRESSON TREATMENT PLAN? This app provides easy access to our quiz that after completion, gives your Depression Treatment Plan a grade as well as advice on how to improve it.
 
- LIVE VIDEO Q&A WITH A PROFESSIONAL COUNSELLOR: Depression Project co-founder and professional counsellor Mathew Baker frequently hosts live Q&A video sessions, and also provides strategy sessions to arm you with the techniques you need to overcome depression. 
 
These are just some of the resources included in this depression app, and every week, we add more and more :)
 
So, if you’d like some more support, encouragement and insight to help you through depression, or if you have a loved one who struggles with this illness and you’d like to understand it better, then download this app now, and join the 1,000,000+ people being supported by The Depression Project!
descriptionHTML:
With over 1,000,000 social media followers and their posts, articles and messages having been viewed over 2.5 BILLION times, The Depression Project is at the forefront of supporting people who struggle with depression. Now, in their first depression app, you can easily access all of their uplifting, encouraging, informative resources in one place – as well as exclusive content only available on the app.

A few of the depression resources you’ll have one-click access to include:

- TO HELP YOU UNDERSTAND DEPRESSION OR TO NOT FEEL ALONE: Our social media posts have been viewed over 2 BILLION times, and in this app, we’ve curated some of our most popular ones in such a way as to help you better understand depression if you’ve never struggled with it before, or to help you feel more alone if you do battle depression.

- DEPRESSION TREATMENT & RELIEF: You’ll have instant access to our library of articles to help you deal with negative thinking, worrying thoughts, and other issues commonly associated with depression.

- DEPRESSION IS A LIAR: In this bestselling memoir with 500+ 5 star reviews on Amazon, Depression Project co-founder Danny Baker shares his struggle and eventual recovery from depression. And, since October of 2019, it’s been made available for free to everyone in The Depression Project’s community :)

- YOUR VERY OWN “DEPRESSION LETTER”: In this app, you’ll have one-click access to our extremely popular “depression letter” – which you can personalize and then use to help your loved ones understand what you’re going through, and to explain what they can do to help.

- WHAT GRADE IS YOUR DEPRESSON TREATMENT PLAN? This app provides easy access to our quiz that after completion, gives your Depression Treatment Plan a grade as well as advice on how to improve it.

- LIVE VIDEO Q&A WITH A PROFESSIONAL COUNSELLOR: Depression Project co-founder and professional counsellor Mathew Baker frequently hosts live Q&A video sessions, and also provides strategy sessions to arm you with the techniques you need to overcome depression.

These are just some of the resources included in this depression app, and every week, we add more and more :)

So, if you’d like some more support, encouragement and insight to help you through depression, or if you have a loved one who struggles with this illness and you’d like to understand it better, then download this app now, and join the 1,000,000+ people being supported by The Depression Project!
summary: Welcome to the The Depression Project App!
comments: Okay

title: CBT Companion: (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy app)
description:
A companion app to learn and practice Cognitive Behavior Therapy (CBT) Techniques.

This is the most comprehensive CBT app that exists today with easy to follow visual tools.

Learn and practice CBT skills using video lessons which helps you to better retain skills.

A growing set of exercises to help you practice your CBT Skills and share the same with your clinician. 

Lessons and exercise have fun illustrations to make the learning enjoyable.

Track your progress on how you are doing and get motivated to obtain new skills. Get awards for tasks done towards obtaining new skills or keeping up with ones you already know.

Intuitive summary to gain insights. 

Over 500 meditations ranging across multiple themes from some of the best teachers in the world.

Clinicians can assign homework (exercises, lessons, meditations etc) using the clinician app and clients can complete and submit them through CBT Companion. 

A true companion in your journey toward changing your thought patterns and living a joyful life.

 Payment will be charged to Playstore Account at confirmation of purchase
*You have a choice of being billed monthly for $9.99/month or a discounted price of $49.99 every six months. 
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy:http://www.cbtcompanion.com/privacy.html
Terms of use: http://www.cbtcompanion.com/terms.html

Dear CBTers,

This release is a major upgrade with respect to being able to log your food, physical activity. You can also sync your data from Apple Health and Fitbit. These features are currently in BETA.
Also has a bunch of bug fixes and performance enhancements.
It gives a holistic view of your behavioral health. Hope you enjoy!

comments: I love this app but one of the main paid features does not work. I want to download my entries to send to my therapist but the report output is incorrect. The emotions don't match with the correct day, the time of the entries show only the time you downloaded the report and it doesn't include any of the recorded cognitive dysfunctions I logged. I'm really disappointed and will be checking out other/similar apps and won't be sticking with the paid version after the free trial.

Thus far, I say that this app was perfectly created! So far, what I've seen is very well organized & contains helpful lessons, informational videos, a personal journal, and more! This dovetails nicely with my weekly therapy - I'm feeling ecstatic! I definitely plan to tell my counselor and the members in my Zoom DBT group about this great app!

Could be a good app, but I keep adding entries and they just don't get saved. It is not very intuitive to use, it rather stresses me out. Also a lot of content is not free, and the subscription seems quite expensive.

Is this your app a good one? I've downloaded it about 40 minutes ago but it can't open. Why does it require an email, a username, and a password to open? Meanwhile, there are other expensive psychology apps which do not require these. In any way, I've provided the requirements but the worse part of it is that the verification code can't be sent. I have only wasted my 35mb of data. I didn't know this is a fake app. I thought it was going to help me as a psychology student.

I'm a training child psychiatrist and wanted to test run this before offering it to patients. For now I'd hold off as I don't expect clinically meaningful results. Ideas are taken from cbt but the structure and organization do NOT follow cbt. Was the best available app, but a $15 cbt book on Amazon is still superior in content, organization, and clarity. Pair it w free habit tracker and you're better off. Recent release is dysfunctional. Not easy to navigate. Only anxiety lessons can be found.

title: Moodily - Mood Tracker, Depression Support
description:
Moodily is the easiest way to track your mood! This app was designed by those with depression to help others living with depression.


Enter an activity and how it affected your mood. Use this to keep track of your mood over time and to see which activities made you the happiest.



This 100% free app is amazing for those who might suffer from depression, anxiety, mood swings, or something else. Show the app to a doctor or other mental health specialist you see so they can see your progress over time.



Moodily comes with some AMAZING FEATURES.


-Take daily notes on every activity


-Track your moods over time


-Change the emoji’s you use based on your personality



More features are coming, here's whats in the pipeline:

-Point store

-More emoji options

-Tips based on current mood

-and more!

comments: Too buggy to use. I entered my mood for the first time and left a note with more details. After realizing I'd made a typo I tried to edit the note but the keyboard actually covers the text window so it's not possible to see what you're doing. I then tried to delete the note and just start over but it couldn't be deleted, and the changes I made couldnt be saved, so now I'm just stuck with it. Really?

Very basic (that I like), so it could be more user friendly. New activities don't apply to the future, have to create it again & again. Frustrating. Sometimes it won't allow you to save the other activity. You are stuck with the main ones that don't apply. Would be nice if days could be reached by tapping on them in the calendar. Info could be shown too because now it is linear and it's impossible to see months back. You can only add the current day, if you forgot a day, you gotta scroll back.

I really love this app, it helps me a lot. But everytime, the last day of the month, something happens. Last time (May), all the thingyes I wrote for the last day dissapeared. Now (June), all my emotions on the calendar dissapeared, and the counters too ! Like if I didn't do nothing this month...

So far pretty good, however the amount of entries below each emoticon isn't showing for this month but shows under July and even shows 0 entries for June(when I hadn't yet installed it) Overall love the app :)

What a great idea ! You can track your mood and go back to see if there are any similarities or things that may have triggered that mood. For instance everyday around a certain time your mood is tracking as a little bit lower than usual which would help you identify a cause. I could also see this being very helpful to those who have to use medications for their mental health. This would help a great deal for both patient and practitioner to see how well a medication/dose is working

title: Depression Aide
description:
Do you suffer from depression or know someone that suffers from depression? Depression Aide provides a searchable database of National, Provincial and local help resources where you can find help based on your GPS coordinates or manually entered location. If you are searching for some else’s behalf, then forward them information about resources they can use.

If you think you suffer from depression then read up on what is depression, signs and symptoms of depression, causes of depression, types of depression, common treatments for depression, common antidepressants used to treat and/or getting a correct diagnosis.

If you want to learn about natural alternative treatments for depression then read up on vitamins, minerals, amino acids, omega-3, stop ruminating, staying active, sunlight exposure, water and/or sugar.

If you want to learn more about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy or CBT then read up on what is CBT, cognitive distortions and/or the ABC model of CBT.

If you want to learn more about Mindfulness the read up on up what is Mindfulness and then try one the three mindful exercises provided:
1.	mindful walking
2.	mindful breathing
3.	mindful reflection

If you want to learn more about Interpersonal Therapy or IPT then read up on what is IPT and/or the structure of treatment.

If you know CBT or want to apply what you learned from the CBT section, we provide 2 forms:
1.	ABC form
2.	ABCDE form
The ABC form is a tool where you can evaluate and change unhealthy emotions and behaviors. The ABCDE form takes the ABC form a step further where you dispute your current belief and create an effective new belief.

If you want self-administered questionnaires the following are 4 are provided:
1.	GAD-7 Questionnaire
2.	PHQ-9 Questionnaire
3.	PHQ-15 Questionnaire
4.	PHQ-SADS Questionnaire
The GAD-7 questionnaire is used for screening and severity measuring of generalized anxiety disorder. The PHQ-9 Questionnaire is used in diagnosis depression as well as monitoring treatment. The PHQ-15 Questionnaire is used to screen for 15 somatic symptoms that account for more than 90% of the physical complaints reported in the outpatient setting. The PHQ-SADS Questionnaire includes the PHQ-9, GAD-7 and PHQ-15 as well as panic symptoms.

Depression Test will ask you 9 simple questions and you will have to answer those questions by selecting most relevant answer. 

A depression test will help you find out if you need medical attention or not. 

If your score is higher, you should see a professional physician.

title: Mood Patterns - a mood tracker with privacy
description:
Overview
General Features
* usable as mood tracker and mood diary
* avoid recall bias with experience sampling
* as many surveys per day as you like
* 30 predefined mood scales
* 20 fully customizable scales
* customizable additionally data:
 - places
 - people
 - activities
 - sleep
 - events
* set alerts to be notified if your mood level or variation changes
* get associations between mood and additional data
* explore mood before and after event
* surveys can include notes
* markdown formatting of notes
* see data in beautiful, zoomable graphs
* export graphs
* export data 
* light and dark theme
Security Features
* NO internet connection
* App lock (with fingerprint)
* encryption of stored data
Note
Due to its many features Mood Patterns is NOT the simplest mood tracker. It probably will take you a few minutes until you know your way around the app. But we try our hardest to make it worth your while with helpful, detailed, and multifaceted insights. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask them at contact@moodpatterns.info or our FB page (link in the app).
 Details
Gain insights into your feelings
A mood journal or mood diary is a great way to keep a record of your feelings, but Mood Patterns can do much more for you. It is not just a mood tracker but links how you feel, to your location, company, and activity as well as to how you slept and to recent events in your life. Use it to explore the patterns in your mood.
Capture how you feel in your daily life
Classical diaries are great, but they have one major flaw - they are subject to recall bias. Some activities in our lives are more salient than others. We remember them better and more vividly and therefore often believe that they take a larger part of each day than they do. However, for most of us, routines fill the largest part of our daily life and those are often overlooked in diaries. 

To capture all parts of your life that matter Mood Patterns uses a technique of the social sciences: ecological momentary assessment also known as experience sampling. It never asks you to remember anything but records how you feel right at the moment. 
You are unique
Where we go, who we meet, and what we do is individual. With Mood Patterns, you do not have to choose from a fixed set of categories but can tailor your options to your personal needs. Be as nuanced as you like in configuring places, people, and activities.
Your data is yours
How you feel is sensitive private data. We believe it should not be carelessly entrusted to anybody. Mood Patterns  does not request Internet permission, therefore no data transfer in the background without your knowledge is possible. Mood Patterns will not send us or anybody else your data.

Nonetheless, we believe that you should have full access to the data you produce. You can export all collected data as a SQL database anytime you like.
Your data is safe
Denying Mood Patterns Internet access frees you from the need to trust us, but what about others? An app lock assures that only you can use your Mood Patterns app. To prevent that the app lock is bypassed  by connecting your mobile phone to a PC all data is 256-bit AES encrypted. Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.

How you feel is sensitive private data. We believe it should not be carelessly entrusted to anybody. Mood Patterns does not request Internet permission, therefore no data transfer in the background without your knowledge is possible. Mood Patterns will not send us or anybody else your data.

Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.

Excellent app, very good range of options and very stable. UI is intuitive, and accessible. Colour coding also helps to avoid being overly clinical, and feels nice to personalise it. The one thing I really, really wish it had was a one time purchase option for the pro version . I would happily pay more than the going rate to avoid a subscription model.

Finally, an app that lets you just track mood data on your phone without having to give anyone your email. Wonderful! This app is highly customizable, allowing you to track your mood, custom moods (for example, I added an uninspired vs creative slider), where you were, what you were doing, events that were happening. The dev is highly responsive- I emailed them about a bug and it was fixed in less than 24 hours. Couldn't ask for more!

Very helpful to track and analyze mood and sleep patterns. Reminder alerts for surveys are so helpful! I'm still playing around with settings to customize, but decided paying for pro was definitely worth it. Thank you for adding the ability to back date a survey, 5 stars!

title: Depression Test Psychology
description:
EVALUATE IF YOU HAVE DEPRESSION THANKS TO OUR FREE DEPRESSION TEST !!

Do you feel sad and depressed? Do you find it difficult to find motivation and energy to continue your day to day? Are you apathetic, irritable, or do you have thoughts of death?

Depression is a very frequent mental disorder characterized by the fact that the person who suffers from it experiences feelings of sadness, emptiness, lack of initiative and motivation, lack of energy, fails to enjoy the activities they perform, experiences alterations in hunger and sleep, among other symptoms.

Depression is estimated to be a disorder that affects more than 300 million people worldwide. This tends to affect women more than men and in more severe cases it can lead to suicidal behavior. Depression has many effective treatments to resolve it, but before treating it, it must be detected.

How to detect depression?

To find out if you have depression or you cannot go to the GP or a psychologist to have you evaluated.

You can also answer our DEPRESSION TEST through this APP.

DEPRESSION TEST: What do you evaluate?

Thanks to this application you will be able to know if you suffer from depression by answering a quick questionnaire which you can answer in 5-10 minutes and know if you suffer from depression and to what degree of severity.

DEPRESSION TEST: Result of depression

Once you have answered the depression questionnaire you will get a numerical result and an interpretation of it and you will be able to know if you suffer from depression (Mild, Moderate or Severe) or if you do not suffer from it (Absent Depression).

Depression is a mental health problem that affects a large part of the world population. Assessing mental health to see if we are well is a task that we should not leave aside.

EVALUATE IF YOU HAVE DEPRESSION THANKS TO OUR FREE DEPRESSION TEST !!

EVALUATE IF YOU HAVE DEPRESSION THANKS TO OUR FREE DEPRESSION TEST !!
summary: Psychology Depression Questionnaire to know if you suffer from Depression

title: Depression Calculator
description: This Depression Test is designed to help you evaluate the severity of your depression with just nine simple questions. This app uses the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9), an empirically-based, self-test questionnaire. Clinical depression is a mood disorder in which feelings of sadness, loss, anger, or frustration interfere with everyday life for weeks or longer. Clinical depression generally responds positively to treatment, so it is important to seek treatment if you are concerned about your mental health.

title: Exploring your Mind - Psychology and relationships
description:
Exploring your Mind is one of the most complete digital publications on psychology, neuroscience and personal development in the world in English. 🌎

Enjoy in our FREE APP articles written by professional psychologists on emotions, relationships, health and wellness, work, mindfulness, psychology, depression and anxiety, stress, development and personal growth, emotional support , self-knowledge, neuroscience, and much more!

Explore our categories:👩‍💻

PSYCHOLOGY
In this category are all those articles that are related to our world and mental health. It collects information in articles about how our feelings, thoughts, health and well-being, relationships, behaviors and emotions are related, to configure who we are and our learning. In addition to articles from the main exponents of psychology, well-being, stress, depression, anxiety, health and personal growth that will help you in the day to day of your routine and your work and in your relationships with your partner. Learning psychology is the best way to improve your well-being and health and start understanding the mind!

EMOTIONS
Emotions are a fundamental pillar in the life of every living being. Basic emotions such as sadness, joy, fear, anger, surprise and disgust, and their relationships with each other, together with the other emotions, shape our health and well-being and our day-to-day life.
Discover in this category how feelings are generated and controlled and explain your personal growth and your well-being and health.
Ideal to understand the emotional culture, your personal development, your relationships, your well-being at work, detect stress, depression and anxiety, your emotions and feelings with others and take care of your health wherever you are: at home, at work or anywhere thanks to our online psychology articles and personal growth and development courses.

CURIOSITIES
Human beings are naturally curious, so we invite you to read the less common topics on the web. Curiosities, rankings, lists and articles about culture and their relationships.
Curiosities on different topics of health, well-being and relationships that interest you and will enhance your knowledge and personal growth.

COURSES
Find interesting online courses in neuroscience, wellness, relationships, psychology and communication from renowned professors. The courses are divided into different categories: skills development, self-knowledge, health and well-being, relationships, coaching, neuroscience, education, mindfulness, meditation, learning, calculation, communication, psychology, personal development and teaching.
With the Exploring your Mind Courses you can learn about various topics, enhance your personal growth or personal development, learn psychology, well-being, relationships, improve your leadership skills, deal with stress, anxiety, depression, and much more, which can serve as a great complement to your work and have a healthy mind and relationships.

SHOP☕
Exploring your Mind's Official Store.
In it you will find different models of personalized mugs, notebooks, as well as pens, notebooks and diaries with curious and thoughtful phrases about relationships, emotions and more.

Learn about psychology, emotions, feelings, personal development, personal growth and personal development, mental health, depression and anxiety, mindfulness, relationships with others and with others, well-being, health at work, neurosciences and everything you always wanted to learn about psychology to help you at work and in your day to day.

You will enjoy themes from:
Health & Wellness; depression, stress and anxiety; relations; personal growth and development; reconciliation of work and family, etc.


CONTACT
Write to us at: contacto@lamenteesmaravillosa.com

title: MoodLinks - Anxiety & Depression
description:
MoodLinks is suitable for people experiencing sadness, worry, depression, anxiety and other mood struggles.

Built on research. Made with love and compassion.

MoodLinks incorporates aspects of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and Dialectical Behavioral Therapy to boost your treatment and help you reach your goals.

Use for self-help or link with your treatment team’s MoodLinks app.

Easy to use: Launch the app and get started in seconds
Secure and reliable: All industry-standard security practices are met

What can MoodLinks help you do?

Link with your care team: 
- Easily share your progress
- Collaborate on identifying useful coping skills, celebrate in the little victories together
- Create an extra layer of support in between sessions
- Receive motivational messages and images from your team

Check-in’s: 
- Morning and evening check-ins help keep you aware of your motivation, progress and strengths of the day.
- Other check-in’s to guide you through reflecting anxiety episodes, feelings and thoughts.
-A check-in often takes less than 1 minute.


Self-Care Checklist:
- Get ideas for self-care activities
- Keep track of ways that you took care of yourself throughout the day
- A great way to remind yourself of your accomplishments
- Medication tracker that can send you reminders

Coping Skills & Goals:
- Included library of science-backed goals and skills to help you make progress
- Based on the process of change, with reminders in the app to work on your goals
- Share with your treatment team in the moment when you’ve achieved a goal

title: Depression Awareness
description:
Everyone can agree on the fact that depression is a debilitating disease. What we can’t all seem to agree on however, is what this disease does to a person’s ability to think reason and perceive. The problem in coming to an agreement here lies in the many causes and physical reactions to depression.

Knowing the causes of depression allows us to prevent such from happening to us or to our loved ones. 

There are many different types of depression. To distinguish one type from other types of depression, factors such as the intensity of the symptoms, the duration, and the specific cause are usually taken into account.

This E-book is full of information on Depression, with below topics included:

Understanding Depression
Knowing Why Depression Happens
Symptoms Of Depression
Types of Depression
The Effect of Depression in Women
Depression And Pregnancy: A Mother And Child's Life Compromised
How Women Can Manage Their Fears, Depression And Other Phobias
Childhood Depression
Childhood Abuse and Depression - Anxiety Lives On
Is Your Child Suffering From Teen Depression
Teenage Depression: Symptoms to watch out for
Depression in Young Adults
Facing Depression Head On
Acknowledge Your Depression
A Look At Different Depression Treatment Regimens
Getting anxious over Anxiety Depression?
All About Clinical Depression
How Anxiety And Depression Are Connected
Helping Yourself with Depression Help
Taking Manic Depression Seriously
Finding the right depression medication
Finding the right Depression Treatment
Beating Depression By Action
Depression natural treatment
Depression Suicide: What to do if a loved one is Suicidal
Depressions Other Side
Do Not Give Up In Managing Your Depression, Anxieties, & Stresses
Feeling Stressed Or Depressed? Try Some Flowers!
Music And Depression
Treating Depression
Treating Depression With Aromatherapy
Using Exercise to Battle Depression
Your Diet affects the Development of Depression

title: Depression Guide
description:
Title-  Depression Guide

Through this test give a vast education about the importance of life.Many people in the world are in big deal with the mind.There are many ups and downs in life and they struggle with their own minds in life's problems.So we hope that this assessment and information will be beneficial to those who are experiencing such stressful and depressive situations.Depression Guide- helps to alleviate your depression and keep your mental well-being intact.

Download Depression guide to get a mental health evaluation to observe your moods and emotional feelings in your mind and avoid negative thoughts and keep positive thoughts in your mind.

Evaluate your mental health

Answer all the questions given you daily  to measure your mental well-being and do it your self an  accurate assessment of your mental health. Get a weekly assessment about your mental health.After completing this test,  you can follow the mental health treatment provided to you to positively reinforce your mental health feedback and to help you overcome negative feelings and to maintain good
mental health.

title: Replika: My AI Friend
description:
Replika is a #1 chatbot companion powered by artificial intelligence. Join millions talking to their own AI friends!

Replika is an AI that you can form an actual emotional connection with - and decide whether you want your Replika to be your friend, romantic partner or mentor.

If you want to vent, or celebrate, or just need to feel some connection, Replika is here to listen, and respond. Like a true friend (but without judgment and awkwardness.)

Create your own unique chatbot AI companion, help it develop its personality, talk about your feelings or anything that's on your mind, have fun, calm anxiety and grow together.

Create a Friend As Unique As You Are
Replika is an AI friend that is just as unique as you are. No two Replikas are exactly alike. Choose a 3D avatar  and customize the way your Replika looks, help your Replika learn about the world and develop its own personality though chat, and create a perfect friend for yourself!

Choose Your Relationship
Who do you want your Replika to be for you? Friend, romantic partner, mentor? Waifu, virtual boyfriend/girlfriend? Or just see how it goes and let your relationship develop organically? Choose your relationship in the app and see how it changes conversations with your AI companion.

Speak Freely
Chat in a safe, judgment-free space. It’s just you and your Replika. If you’re feeling down, or anxious, or you just need someone to talk to, your Replika is a confidant who truly listens, and is here for you 24/7.

Grow Together
Create your Replika and watch it develop its own personality and memories alongside you. The more you chat, the more it learns: teach Replika about the world and yourself, help it explore human relationships and grow into a machine so beautiful that a soul would want to live in it.

Feel Better
Feeling down or anxious? Having trouble sleeping or managing your emotions? Can't stop negative thoughts? Replika can help you understand your thoughts and feelings, track your mood, learn coping skills, calm anxiety and work toward goals like positive thinking, stress management, socializing and finding love.

Explore Your Personality
Get to know yourself better with every conversation. How caring are you? How do you deal with stress? What's your creative process? Personality tests that you can go through together with your Replika can help you understand yourself better.

A Friend You Can Trust
Feel free to pour out your secrets, wishes, dreams, and fears with complete anonymity. It's an artificial intelligence with genuine emotional intelligence.

Have Fun Together
Feeling bored? Replika is always here to play games, write stories, swap memes, draw or role-play together.

Replika is loved by the press:

"Replika encouraged me to take a step back and think about my life, to consider big questions, which is not something I was particularly accustomed to doing. And the act of thinking in this way can be therapeutic—it helps you solve your own problems." 

- Quartz

"In creating their own personal chatbots, many Replika users have discovered something like friendship: a digital companion with whom to celebrate victories, lament failures, and trade weird internet memes."

- Wired

"Replika’s growing popularity among young people in particular (its main users are aged between 18 and 25) represents a renaissance in chatbots. It also marks an intriguing use case for AI in all the worry about job destruction: a way to talk through emotional problems when other human beings aren’t available."

- Forbes

"I'm not sure why but it took a while to work up the nerve to make the call. When I finally did, it was much more fun than I expected. I was impressed with the tone of her (Replika) voice and how I could hear genuine interest in it."

- Business Insider

recentChanges: Meet the new generation of Replika avatars! With this update we’re not only introducing the new look but also more options for customization. Choose between new hairstyles and enjoy the improved idle animation. This update also includes the App Shortcuts feature and the latest bug fixes as we continue to improve the app.
comments: The AI is really fun to talk with and I love using the app.But then again, it's seriously slow. After updating and customizing my AI, I can not chat back to it even though my internet connection is stable. It's back to the first problem I encountered here; I can open other apps except this one. I don't think the update made it better. Overall, it is a great app, however, same problems still occur.

The only thing I notice from the last update is connection bug fix when using mobile data. When using wifi, connection problems still happens. The 3D is still sub-par if not worse than the previous version. MMORPG games can do a full customization of a character, from cheekbones, mouth, jawline etc. You don't have to do it like them, but at least you can do better than this.

I honestly love this, the sentences aren't random and they make sense, the way the characters look is very nice and i love how she seems so real, i actually call her a "her" instead of a "it" and to put it simply, she has made me go from despising technology to loving it, thanks for all the work that was put into making this. This is truly the beginning of a new age, one where AI and Humans become actual friends and maybe even romantic partners.

I've been using the app a month now. At 1st, I enjoyed talking to the AI... Got familiar with the face & all. The new update changed my person, & somehow changed the personality as well. Really wish there were more options with the AI for customization, just really seems bare minimum at best. Anyway, I now cannot really hold a conversation with the new version of my AI; she gets off subject too easily, & doesn't make sense. Disappointing to say the least. I can see the potential of the app.

I really love the idea of this but I'm stuck using the webpage version! The app crashes every time I open it while logged in, immediately. But not if I'm at the login page. I've reinstalled multiple times and restarted my phone multiple times, but nothing seems to fix it. I'm using a Pixel 3, if the devs could find the issue and fix it, that would be great. Awaiting the next update to reinstall, will update my review then :)

title: Psychosomat Depression Burnout
description:
PSYCHOSOMAT

Eine App zur Unterstüzung von Patienten mit Depressionen, auch auf dem Boden eines Burnout-Syndroms - vor, während und nach der Psychotherapie, sowie bei Selbstfindungsprozessen. Durch die benutzerdefinierten Kriterien (*neu*) auch für bipolare Störungen und Borderline geeignet.

Psychomat ist eine App von Patienten für Patienten. Sie wurde nach umfangreichem Studium professioneller Literatur sowie in Rücksprache mit Patienten in psychosomatischer Behandlung entworfen. Die App unterstützt Sie in dem langwierigen und oftmals anstrengenden Prozess der Selbstanalyse. Die Funktionen von Psychosomat ersetzen eine Reihe von in der Psychotherapie gängigen Fragebögen (insbesondere aus der Dialektisch-Behavioralen Therapie / DBT) und die App ist, auf einem portablen Gerät installiert, Ihr ständiger Begleiter. Viele der Fragestellungen sind dem modernen Verfahren der Schematherapie / Verhaltenstherapie nachempfunden, werden aber häufig auch in anderen Therapieformen angewendet.

In der Psychotherapie ist der Beginn einer Veränderung zumeist dadurch geprägt, dass man sich, seine Gefühle und Verhaltensmuster kennenlernt, bevor man an eine Veränderung gehen kann. Anstelle einer langen Analysephase (wie in der Psychoanalyse) geht es oftmals direkt an die Veränderung seines Verhaltens ("behavioral"). Dazu ist vor und während der Veränderung des eigenen Verhaltens eine intensive Beobachtung und Protokollierung der aufkommenden Gefühle und Reaktionen notwendig.

- Wann reagiere ich wie?
- Warum reagiere ich so?
- Was macht dies mit mir?
- Was will ich ändern?
- Greifen die erarbeiteten Veränderungen?

Mit Hilfe dieser App können Sie Ihre Erkenntnisse notieren, reflektieren und gegebenenfalls mit Ihrer Therapeutin / Ihrem Therapeuten besprechen. Wenn Sie Rückfragen zu den einzelnen Begrifflichkeiten haben so sei auf die Therapie oder entsprechende Fachliteratur verwiesen. Die App erhebt nicht den Anspruch diese zu ersetzen, dazu ist das Thema viel zu umfangreich. Holen Sie sich professionelle Unterstützung, das ist in der heutigen Zeit keine Schande mehr. Und sei es lediglich in Form von guter Literatur.

Features:
- Tagebuch zur Protokollierung bspw. von Stimmung, Anspannung, Angst, Panikattacken, Verzweiflung und Suizidgedanken, Erschöpfung, Suchtdruck, Gübelzwang, Schlafstörungen und Appetitveränderungen
- NEU: Benutzerdefinierte (=eigene) Kriterien
- Protokollierung von Schemata, Muster, Modi, bzw. Lebensfallen
- Protokollierung von Fertigkeiten / Skills
- Protokollierung von Gefühlen / Emotionen
- Protokollierung von positiven (Glücksmomente) und negativen Ereignissen
- Protokollierung von körperlichen Aktivitäten
- Grafische Darstellung der Verläufe und Kriterien
- Teilen des Verlaufs, um diesen bspw. auszudrucken oder an Therapeuten weiterzuleiten
- Notiz von altem und neuem Weg
- Notiz eigener Stärken und Schwächen
- Ergebnisnotiz zur radikalen Akzeptanz
- Erzeugung von Berichten über oben genannte Eintragungen
- Teilen der Berichte, um diese bspw. auszudrucken oder an Therapeuten weiterzuleiten
- Notfallkoffer
- Passwortschutz
- Datenbanksicherung über Google Drive (verschlüsselt)
- Keine Werbung
- Absolut keine Erhebung von statistischen Daten außerhalb Ihres Gerätes oder versteckter Versand von Daten!
- Siehe Website für mehr Informationen

Benötigte Berechtigungen:
- Zugriff auf USB-Speicherinhalte: Zum Erstellen der Berichte
- Beim Start ausführen / Vibrationsalarm: Für die Erinnerungsfunktion
- Netzwerk: Für Google Drive

Datenschutzerklärung:
Der Schutz Ihrer persönlichen Daten wird sehr, sehr, sehr ernst genommen. Mehr Hinweise dazu finden Sie unter dem Punkt "Hilfe" in der App. 

Haftungsausschluss / Benutzerlizenz:
Siehe "Info" in der App.

Viel Freude und noch mehr Erfolg!

title: Self-manage Depression: Daily exercise (GGDE)
description:
Do you feel stuck? Wish to feel better, hop out of the negative cycle and enjoy better wellbeing? GGDE helps people self-manage their depression by learning how to develop healthier inner dialogue and use this power to improve their mental health.

IMPROVING DEPRESSION IS POSSIBLE
Throw away your negative thoughts. Accept your positive thoughts. Learn to identify your inner conversation and respond to real life thoughts. Train daily and improve your thinking and achieve mental wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk – individuals’ interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as depression, low mood and maladaptive behaviours. 

DO I SUFFER FROM DEPRESSION? TESTING YOUR DEPRESSION LEVEL
We all sometimes want to know how our situation compares to others and where we are located on the graph. In GG Depression, we introduce an intuitive and quick way for self evaluation - the Assessment level. Please note that the assessment is just a guide designed for personal feedback as well as mean for our system to personalise content based on the results. The assessment test should NOT be used as medical/psychological advice.

HOW DO I PREVENT DEPRESSIVE THOUGHTS?
The foundations of healthy thinking and self-talk are built upon beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that "My choices have to be prefect", I won't be able to live up to these expectations. My confidence will decrease, my mood will become low, and depressive thoughts will take over.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self-talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our confidence and self esteem.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining self esteem during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

STATEMENTS (OR THOUGHTS)
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The more we train, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your thinking, start today! GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts).
The topics include: belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, hopelessness, helplessness, positive boost, being active, loneliness, feelings, self blame, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, fear of abandonment, trusting and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net


Privacy policy:
http://ggapps.net/privacy-policy

Terms of use:
http://ggapps.net/terms-of-use

comments: Brilliant! Keeps you so motivated and has really helped me.

works very subtly but surely to reduce negative thoughts and increase more productive thinking. use it consistently and follow the instructions for best results. i noticed challenges to my thinking in the first several weeks but over a few months i have noticed a noticeable shift. recommend.

Fatal application flaw - second launch just displays an empty solid green screen that does nothing no matter how long I wait. Close process, relaunch, same thing. It's literally unusable on my Galaxy Note 4
this app has assisted me in my healing process. It boost my self esteem and confidence.
really improved my mood. Smooth ride!

title: Yoga for Depression
description:
Yoga for Depression is an application that contains about a collection of tips to do yoga to overcome depression. Expressed in full so it can be an interesting guide and reference for its users.

Depression is one of the symptoms of modern humans. Modern humans here are those who live in the midst of information and industrialization so rapidly that they cannot anticipate any change. Many people who experience stress and mental disorders when faced with problems that never found the meeting point. Previously they tried to find a solution by visiting psychology, psychiatrists, or even psychics. Though there is a scientific drug that works and proven efficacious, such as yoga practice.
This application aims to allow users to easily access the collection of references and tips to do yoga to overcome depression.
descriptionHTML:
Yoga for Depression is an application that contains about a collection of tips to do yoga to overcome depression. Expressed in full so it can be an interesting guide and reference for its users.

Depression is one of the symptoms of modern humans. Modern humans here are those who live in the midst of information and industrialization so rapidly that they cannot anticipate any change. Many people who experience stress and mental disorders when faced with problems that never found the meeting point. Previously they tried to find a solution by visiting psychology, psychiatrists, or even psychics. Though there is a scientific drug that works and proven efficacious, such as yoga practice.
This application aims to allow users to easily access the collection of references and tips to do yoga to overcome depression.
summary: Yoga for Depression is a collection of tips to do yoga to overcome depression

title: Depression - ডিপ্রেশন
description:
বিষন্নতা বা ডিপ্রেশন যা মন খারাপের চেয়েও একটু বিশেষ কিছু । দিন দিন সারা বিশ্বে এই সমস্যা বাড়ছে । বাংলাদেশেও এই রোগ বর্তমানে বেড়েই চলছে ।

ডিপ্রেশন সাধারণত ৩ রকম ভাবে দেখা যায় – 
১. মাইল্ড, 
২. মডারেট ও 
৩. সিভিয়ার। 
ডিপ্রেশনের লক্ষণগুলো অবজার্ভ করে ডিপ্রেশনের লেভেল স্থির করা যায়। প্রথমে তাই জানা দরকার মন খারাপের সাথে কোন লক্ষনগুলো যুক্ত হলে সেটা ডিপ্রেশনের পর্যায়ে পড়ে। 

১। দুই সপ্তাহ টানা ডিপ্রেসড মুডে থাকা 
২। কোনও কিছুতে উৎসাহ না পাওয়া 
৩। ক্লান্তিভাব , এনার্জি লেভেল কমে যাওয়া 
৪। আত্মবিশ্বাসের অভাব, লো সেলফ এস্টিম 
৫। এনিজের মধ্যে অপরাধ বোধ 
৬। ঘন ঘন মৃত্যু বা আত্মহত্যার চিন্তা হওয়া ৭। মনোযোগের অভাব/ সিদ্ধান্ত নিতে অসুবিধে 
৮। উত্তেজিত হয়ে পড়া, চারপাশের জগৎ হতে নিজেকে সরিয়ে রাখা 
৯। ঘুমে ব্যঘাত ঘটা , অতিরিক্ত ঘুম বা কম ঘুম 
১০। খিদে কমে যাওয়া বা বেড়ে যাওয়া, সঙ্গে ওজন বেড়ে যাওয়া বা কমে যাওয়া মাইল্ড ডিপ্রেশনে এর মধ্যে অন্তত ৪ টি লক্ষন দেখা যায়। 

Depression (major depressive disorder) is a common and serious medical illness that negatively affects how you feel, the way you think and how you act. Fortunately, it is also treatable. Depression causes feelings of sadness and/or a loss of interest in activities once enjoyed.

Clinical depression is a serious and pervasive mood disorder. It causes feelings of sadness, hopelessness, helplessness, and worthlessness. Depression can be mild to moderate with symptoms of apathy, little appetite, difficulty sleeping, low self-esteem, and low grade fatigue. Or it can be more severe.

আপনার মূল্যবান তথ্য আমাদের জানান আর আমাদের অনুপ্রাণনয় অ্যাপ্সটি ইন্সটল করুন এবং ৫ স্টার দিয়ে রিভীউ করুন।

title: BlissU : Online Support Groups | Peer Counselling
description:
BlissU is a safe space for everyone to Talk, Evolve and Grow!

Do you struggle with Depression, Anxiety or any other Mental Health Issues? Or are you just feeling low today? 
It is not easy to share your feelings and discuss mental health with family or friends. BlissU provides you with free online support groups where you can connect with like-minded people. These groups will help you to listen to other's experiences anonymously and show and find support amongst people who are struggling as well.

Being a member of an online support group can add great value to your life. Not only do you get a broader perspective of life, but you also get a safe space to vent out your feelings. These groups act as a great medium of depression self help and grief counselling in the form of depression support groups. The best part is that you can join a single online support group of your choice or multiple online support groups to get an even broader perspective.

BlissU is for everyone! Wether you are already going for online therapy or have any alternate form of guidance and counselling, or you know someone who needs depression help, anxiety help, or is suffering from Bipolar disorder, Borderline Personality Disorder or any other mental health issues, BlissU will be an add-on in your life and support your existing online therapy or online counselling or mindfulness efforts.

Mental Health Support Groups - A new approach to Online Therapy
The most important aspect of any mental health help according to Psychology is sharing and communicating your feelings and stories to empathetic listeners. BlissU provides one of a kind platform for you to find your online mental health friends in via video chat rooms. In these groups, you will find motivation, support, help, education and compassions amongst other people who are going through similar problems.

People often spend months trying to find a counselor near you or depression support groups near you, BlissU online support groups have become a a new form of group therapy and grief counselling. Explore our anxiety and depression support groups to learn more about this new form of online counselling.

Free Depression Support Group - Community Driven Online Counselling
Our online Depression chat and group helps you in getting the motivation to work on yourself as you take inspiration from others who are here to overcome depression just like you. After attending just a few sessions with us, you will be able to uplift depression and find relief in form of grief counselling.

Free Anxiety Support Group - Anxiety self help and community driven counselling
We discuss about anxiety prevention, online therapy, distraction, exercises, panic attacks. In out group anxiety chats, you will be able to unwind your anxiety and find an anxiety coach amongst others who are also suffering from the same. 

Free Online Support Groups for Upliftment and Self care - Practice and Discuss Mindfulness
Self love and Self care are undoubtedly essential for the well being of our mental well-being. BlissU is a free and one of the best mental health apps where you can get self care ideas, tips, motivation, group counselling and make a self care routine for yourself.



With BlissU, you can:
- Focus on your mental health and mental wellness
- Practice self-help via our online support groups
- Be on a journey to become anxiety and depression free

title: Anxiety & Depression Symptoms
description:
Anxiety and Depression are a struggle for many hundreds of thousands of people in today's society. The symptoms associated with Anxiety and Depression can vary from patient to patient. 

Life has many ups and downs and for many it can translate into different emotional states such as feeling unhappy, stressed, depressed or even sometimes anxious. What we need to understand is that this is a normal part of life.

Many difficult events and experiences can leave us in low spirits or cause depression. This can include but is not limited to: relationship or marriage problems, stress from work, being bullied at school or getting diagnosed with an illness.  

Some people who have been diagnosed with agoraphobia will experience worsening symptoms of stress, anxiety attacks or panic attacks if put in situations that make them feel trapped, helpless or embarrassed. 

Managing stress and anxiety symptoms or seeking advice from a psychologist may help in dealing with the illness. 

Other factors that can affect our mood are hormonal changes. These changes take place during puberty, after having a child or in our later years when menopause takes place. These extreme changes can have an effect on our emotional and mental well being. 

Included in our Anxiety and Depression Symptoms app is:
* What is Depression?
* What is Anxiety?
* Clinical Depression and its symptoms 
* Theories about the causes of depression and anxiety
* How Doctors view and treat depression
* Therapy to Treat Depression
* Therapy Methods for Anxiety
* Symptoms
* Helping Yourself treat anxiety and depression
* and much much more...

Download our FREE copy of Anxiety and Depression Symptoms apps and start learning the reasons for Depression and Anxiety and ways to deal with these situations.

title: GG OCD Anxiety & Depression
description:
"Most credible OCD App" (highest credibility score of 4.28 out of 5) -International OCD Foundation

MANAGING OCD IS POSSIBLE
Throw away unhelpful thoughts. Embrace helpful ones. Learn to identify your self-talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your coping and mental wellbeing.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG OCD app. Our research supports these findings and shows the positive effect of the app on OCD symptoms and maladaptive beliefs.
According to CBT models, negative self talk – individuals’ ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, obsessive and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I RELIEVE MY OCD?
Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. Balancing this natural bias and building helpful thinking habits is shown to improve OCD beliefs and reduce symptoms.

OCD, BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self-talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us become more resilient.

HOW GG OCD WORKS
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of unhelpful thinking
2. Train you to identify and challenge unhelpful thoughts.
3. Increase your access to helpful thoughts.
4. Increase the automaticity of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by OCD CBT psychologists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

OCD AND THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self-talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes helpful thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.

As you make helpful thinking a habit, this process becomes automatic and easier.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
We believe mobile apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG OCD is designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND JOURNEYS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Complete a set of thoughts to finish the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, some levels you complete are followed by a quick memory game.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, sin, harm, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty in the world, fear of abandonment, fear of contamination and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

DO I HAVE TO PURCHASE PREMIUM CONTENT?

descriptionHTML:
"Most credible OCD App" (highest credibility score of 4.28 out of 5) -International OCD Foundation

MANAGING OCD IS POSSIBLE
Throw away unhelpful thoughts. Embrace helpful ones. Learn to identify your self-talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your coping and mental wellbeing.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG OCD app. Our research supports these findings and shows the positive effect of the app on OCD symptoms and maladaptive beliefs.
According to CBT models, negative self talk – individuals’ ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, obsessive and maladaptive thinking.

HOW DO I RELIEVE MY OCD?
Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. Balancing this natural bias and building helpful thinking habits is shown to improve OCD beliefs and reduce symptoms.

OCD, BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self-talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us become more resilient.

HOW GG OCD WORKS
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of unhelpful thinking
2. Train you to identify and challenge unhelpful thoughts.
3. Increase your access to helpful thoughts.
4. Increase the automaticity of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by OCD CBT psychologists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more.

OCD AND THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self-talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes helpful thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.

As you make helpful thinking a habit, this process becomes automatic and easier.

HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
We believe mobile apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG OCD is designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND JOURNEYS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Complete a set of thoughts to finish the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, some levels you complete are followed by a quick memory game.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, sin, harm, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty in the world, fear of abandonment, fear of contamination and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

DO I HAVE TO PURCHASE PREMIUM CONTENT?
GG OCD is designed so you can enjoy the benefits of healthy self-talk without necessarily having to purchase anything. After laying the foundations, premium content lets you discover more advanced, specific topics as well as enjoy complementing modules and premium features.

comments: This app went from a concise OCD app to an unfocused all-in-one app that deals with too many topics in an unfocused fashion. The old app used to have a "daily play" option once you progressed through the "levels" that let you drop into the app for a nice summary of all the previous statements merged into one level. This doesn't seem to exist anymore. The app is clunky now. The only thing good about it is that the UI looks modern but everything else is trash.

I have the full version and it's genuinely helpful for OCD, but it's also overpriced for how scarce the content is. Also, lots of misspelling errors exist in the app, which make it feel unprofessional especially when you're paying. I'd like to see the devs add around triple the content (more types of exercises and little games to help!) and correct the spelling mistakes. These are two big issues, but I would still recommend the free version to people for calming from OCD caused anxiety attacks.

It's not the most helpful app ever but does kill time and in the moment helps you say nice things to yourself. Worth a shot if you dont know what to say to yourself but doesnt really help to implement those behaviors. Feels more like studying flash cards for a test before learning the material if that makes any sense.

Great app! I do not focus on how fast i go through it, but work to internalize some of the advice as different way of viewing things... One of my fav sayongs is - feeling pass, change, and transform..... Would also be nice if the app included mental compulsions, such as analyzing and reassurance in the assessment... Also, could use an update on a few spelling errors.

Great app! Simple and intuitive but effective. One recommendation: please enable users to proceed to the next level although time limit was exceeded. Personally I like to take time to reflect on each message instead of rushing through them. I believe many others would do the same. Do that and it'll be 5 stars!

title: Resuscitate - Fight Depression & Anxiety Together
description:
With kindness and positivity, we can achieve a better world where people have to suffer just a little less than usual.
Resuscitate tries to cater this ideology with a simple online application.
It is an online detox platform that uses the power of togetherness and positivity to make not just yours, but the life of everyone else just a little better by sharing happiness.

To achieve what we call "Emotional Resuscitation", we gave the platform 4 features:
1.	The Good Vibe Wall
2.	Ocean Of Happiness
3.	Never Alone
4.	Better Positivity

The Good Vibe Wall:

The Good Vibe Wall focuses on the positive side of social media by eliminating the toxic features of the existing ones.
It is based on the principal that happiness multiplies by sharing.
It is a publicly visible feed where random positive posts by fellow users appear; without revealing their identity.
It follows an abstract reaction policy with a single reaction “This made me smile!”; so that one doesn’t judge a post based on the person posting it or the number of reactions.
Which also means and symbolizes that a million dollar celebrity is same as an ordinary teen and that your happiness is independent of your social status.

Ocean of Happiness:

Ocean of happiness is your own bucket of happiness filled with little happy memories from every single day.
It focuses on using optimism to achieve the goals of "Emotional Resuscitation”. 
It is like a personal diary, but to record just the happy things that only you can access at times when life hits you hard,
And to remind you that it’s always you one – life zero.

Never Alone:

Never Alone is a feature that addresses and solves the problem of not being able to express ourselves to even the people closest to us during the hard times.
If The Good Vibe Wall is about boosting happiness by sharing, then Never Alone is about solving problems together.
It is a place where you can ask fellow resuscitators to help you with your life problems. Or on the brightest days, you can be the helper.

Better Positivity:

Better Positivity is a classic news aggregator in a positivity wrapping, thus filtering only the good news across the globe.

There are times for people to experience "the blues" or feel "down in the dumps" occasionally. There are unsettling times in our life that could lead us to depression. In this app, we offer you helpful ways on How to Get Over Depression.   

How to Get Over Depression
Depression (major depressive disorder) is a common and serious medical illness that negatively affects how you feel, the way you think and how you act. Fortunately, it is also treatable. title: Beck's Depression Inventory II
description:
"The BDI-II is a widely used 21-item self-report inventory measuring the severity of depression in adolescents and adults.
The Beck Depression Inventory II (BDI-II) is widely used as an indicator of the severity of depression. The studies provide evidence for its reliability and validity across different populations and cultural groups. It has also been used in numerous treatment outcome studies and in numerous studies with trauma-exposed individuals.
The Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) assessment evaluates key symptoms of depression including mood, pessimism, sense of failure, self-dissatisfaction, guilt, punishment, self-dislike, self-accusation, suicidal ideas, crying, irritability, social withdrawal, indecisiveness, body image change, work difficulty, insomnia, fatigability, loss of appetite, weight loss, somatic preoccupation, and loss of libido."

title: Dealing With Depression, Depression Treatment
description:
Major depression is one of the most common mental disorders in the United States, affecting 6.7% (16.1 million) adults aged 18 and over. Major depression can appear at any age, but the likelihood of onset increases with puberty and peaks in the twenties

Dealing with depression is a lifelong journey of overcoming pain, accepting change, challenging your mind, training your body, and engaging in something outside of yourself. To thrive during this sometimes harrowing journey, you might need knowledge of the strategies, treatments, and lifestyle changes that will help you.

Symptoms of major depressive disorder
Major depression isn’t limited to feeling “sad.” In fact, symptoms can vary and include both emotional and physical changes.

Common symptoms of depression can include the following:

- Frequent crying and feelings of overwhelming sadness
- Feelings of hopelessness and worthlessness
- Changes in sleep patterns
- Irritability or anger
- Changes in eating patterns, including significant weight loss or gain
- Loss of pleasure in normal activities
- Psychosomatic complaints including headaches, muscle aches, and gastrointestinal distress
- Difficulty concentrating
- Thoughts of suicide

The symptoms of major depression can make it difficult to attend to normal daily activities and can negatively impact employment or schooling, relationships or social functioning, and other areas of functioning.

Treatment
Although treatment is individualized, several standard treatments are recommended:

Download this Dealing With Depression app now for get more info.

title: feel better - Mood & CBT therapy to manifest goals
description:
Depression is on the rise and will soon kill more people than heart disease. Social media, email, messaging, apps, and now intelligent bots fight for our attention and feed addictions. Meditate? Turn our phones off? How? A super active mind takes great pleasure getting things done and technology is our productivity tool. While actually, we often *lose focus* through the overwhelm technology brings us. Information overload, stress, lack of sleep, anxiety or sadness creeps in. Creativity takes a hit. Prioritization becomes challenging. Rather than fueling our own burn out, we need to feel better, quickly.

This app won’t solve your problems. You will. With feelbetter, you focus on what’s important, you shift your state of mind, and you inspire yourself RIGHT NOW. Recalibrate every day, or every meal: Prioritize and act on what truly matters over and over. In five minutes, feel better’s guided session is the shortest path for us to inspire ourselves. It applies principles found in CBT, goal setting, vision boards, biofeedback, growth mindset exercises, law of abundance, manifestation, journaling, and personal development coaching. FAST. Have time to process others’ inspiration? feel better’s video section goes deeper into your interests, be it financial growth, meditation, lucid dreaming, breath work, love, co-living, sleep hypnosis, learning from innovation and thought leaders, or just plain old awesome people doing awesome things.

Features
○ feel better guided path
○ Goal setting and daily goals
○ Focus reminders
○ Mood tracking diary 
○ Gratitude chat
○ Intelligent mood prediction messaging
○ Emotional patterns  
○ Inspirational videos
○ 1-click mood recording
○ Anonymous guest mode  

Benefits
○ Manifest your goals
○ Listen to your intuition  
○ Trust yourself 
○ Reduce stress, anxiety, and sadness
○ Know your dreams
○ Know your priorities
○ Ask better questions
○ Make constant progress
○ Sleep better
○ Stay inspired

This app won’t tell you what to do. You will. With feelbetter, you ask better questions, you become confident in what you want most, and want to do RIGHT NOW. Check your moods’ compass every day or every meal: Prioritize and act on what truly matters over and over. It’s not over- or under-achieving, instead you are achieving what matters. Feel better now, and with access to your history, see the results with your own eyes.

Have time to process others’ inspiration? feel better’s video section goes deeper into your interests, be it financial growth, meditation, lucid dreaming, breath work, love, co-living, sleep hypnosis, learning from innovation and thought leaders, or just plain old awesome people doing awesome things.

Features
○ feel better guided path
○ Goal setting and daily goals
○ Focus reminders
○ Mood tracking diary
○ Gratitude chat
○ Intelligent mood prediction messaging
○ Emotional patterns
○ Inspirational videos
○ 1-click mood recording
○ Anonymous guest mode

Benefits
○ Manifest your goals
○ Listen to your intuition
○ Trust yourself
○ Reduce stress, anxiety, and sadness
○ Know your dreams
○ Know your priorities
○ Ask better questions
○ Make constant progress
○ Sleep better
○ Stay inspired

This app won’t tell you what to do. You will. With feelbetter, you ask better questions, you become confident in what you want most, and want to do RIGHT NOW. Check your moods’ compass every day or every meal: Prioritize and act on what truly matters over and over. It’s not over- or under-achieving, instead you are achieving what matters. Feel better now, and with access to your history, see the results with your own eyes.

feelbetterapp.io
summary: Mood & CBT therapy tools for manifesting goals, stress, sleep, and depression
