-Ability to switch between quests and come back to them later
-Improved medication scheduling customization
-Increased medication reminders to 10 per day
-Added notched device UI support
-Fixed UI on wider aspect ratio devices
-Improved performance and stability
-Fixed bugs
comments: I feel like this is a really good app, gives me a little bit of responsibility by waking up my buddy and gets me to go out and do simple but meaningful tasks. It also tracks everyday on a calendar so you can see how you've been doing feeling wise and has a journal page, etc. Wish I could interact with the buddy a bit more though. Great app, keeps me going, even on tough days.

I've been using this app on and off for years now, it's simple to use with no ads and a good paced system that engages you to check back every day. I personally love the nostalgic feel of the graphics + it's easy to run because it's not super detailed. it focuses where it matters most with gentle reminders here and there to make sure you're taking care of yourself. I would recommend this app to someone who needs it. if you're unsure, get it. you can uninstall if it's not for you. stay safe! <3

This is a good app for keeping yourself safe mentally, so I find it quite useful. However, I think that the designs of the buddies and UI isn't as clean and pretty as I would like which puts me off using it at times, but that's probably just the visual arts student in me being nitpicky 😖

Great app. In the favorite coping method section, can they be sorted by category (like in the general list of coping methods, but it would only show your favorites) to make it easier to find what I'm looking for. Or at least not have multiple instances of a certain coping method. If the same method is in more than one category and I favorite them both, there is multiples of different methods and it gets cluttered and repetitive

I am blown away. First recommended to me by someone on a crisis text line. I've had it for a week and it is FANTASTIC. I have been keeping more healthy habits because the app makes me feel like I'm achieving something. The journaling section helps me to find joy in little things and expose me to self-commpassion, which is difficult for me. I also love that it has coping skills for almost EVERYTHING, plus a crisis plan. Oh and guys, this app is actually FREE! no in app purchases!

title: HADS
description:
ATTENTION! This program is a professional medical calculator and intended for use only health care professionals.

Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) was originally developed by Zigmond and Snaith (1983) and is commonly used by doctors to determine the levels of anxiety and depression that a patient is experiencing. The HADS is a fourteen item scale that generates ordinal data. Seven of the items relate to anxiety and seven relate to depression. Zigmond and Snaith created this outcome measure specifically to avoid reliance on aspects of these conditions that are also common somatic symptoms of illness, for example fatigue and insomnia or hypersomnia. This, it was hoped, would create a tool for the detection of anxiety and depression in people with physical health problems.
The proper support for devices with different screen sizes (including tablet PC) has been done.

The application is available in the following languages:
- English
- Russian

Example of detailed test report: *

Patient's ID: Smith J.
Date & Time: 19/10/2014 16:03
________________________________
Test: HADS
________________________________
ANSWERS: 
I feel tense or 'wound up': A LOT OF THE TIME
I get a sort of frightened feeling as if something awful is about to happen: YES, BUT NOT TOO BADLY
Worrying thoughts go through my mind: A LOT OF THE TIME
I can sit at ease and feel relaxed: USUALLY
I get a sort of frightened feeling like 'butterflies' in the stomach: OCCASIONALLY
I feel restless as I have to be on the move: QUITE A LOT
I get sudden feelings of panic: QUITE OFTEN
I still enjoy the things I used to enjoy: NOT QUITE SO MUCH
I can laugh and see the funny side of things: NOT QUITE SO MUCH NOW
I feel cheerful: SOMETIMES
I feel as if I am slowed down: VERY OFTEN
I have lost interest in my appearance: I DON'T TAKE AS MUCH CARE AS I SHOULD
I look forward with enjoyment to things: RATHER LESS THAN I USED TO
I can enjoy a good book or radio or TV program: SOMETIMES
RESULTS: 
Anxiety: 12 points, Abnormal
Depression: 9 points, Borderline abnormal
________________________________

* - This feature will be available after the donation


Any suggestions, inquiries are welcomed by e-mail to drchernj@gmail.com with the "Android-HADS" mark in the subject line. 

Please, help us to make the application available in your own language.

title: FeelJoy - Mental Well-Being for Anxiety
description:
Are anxiety, low self-esteem and depressive thoughts bothering you? Have plenty friends but no one to talk to? Feeljoy Buddy is here to support you! Here, you can interact with individuals who are available to talk to you in real time. Learn more about self-care and self-reflection in an ecosystem designed by Feeljoy for the very purpose of helping you cope with the stressors of daily life and promoting emotional wellbeing. Feeljoy Buddy is your new Mental Health companion.

Good at counselling others? Been told that you’re a good listener? Think you can help others by helping them vent out? Want to help promote the idea of Mental Wellness and Mental Wellbeing? Be a Buddy with us and support others' well-being by being an effective listener.

COMPANIONSHIP
•	Connect with *The Buddy*, your all-time support system.
•	Gain a good listener who is always ready to help.

INTROSPECT THE INNER YOU
•	Self reflection through others' experience.
•	Gain knowledge on your own psychology and therapy.

ANONYMITY
•	An app that guarantees anonymity.

TOP FEATURES
•	Customized
•	Anonymous
•	Connect to a Buddy (free service)
•	Self-Help area
•	User friendly
•	Quick screening assessments: to help you identify problems and get a personalized plan through a Coach

CHARGES
•	FREE

BOOST YOUR HAPPINESS WITH OUR EMOTIONAL WELL BEING APP
•	Learn how to effectively deal with you problems.
•	Learn how to let go of unhealthy coping mechanisms. 
•	If you ever feel exhausted and drained, you have a buddy to listen to all you have to say. 
•	A judgment free zone where you can openly discuss all your problems while staying anonymous. 

*PRODUCT DESCRIPTION*
Everyone faces problems like anxiety, depression, sadness in their daily life but we usually end up keeping it all to ourselves because of various reasons like fear of judgment, fear of rejection, not wanting to “burden” our friends with our problems and the list goes on. Stressors and problems are a part of life that tend to throw us off balance more than we realize. Given our super busy lives, we rarely pay attention to signs of deteriorating mental health, let alone put it to check. Talking it out and sharing your thoughts serves as a great remedy to all such problems. 

Feeljoy Buddy helps you cope with the above problems and gain self-esteem by assigning you a Buddy who’ll listen to all you have to say as well as supporting you. Receive help from individuals who are ready to help. After all to be healthy as a whole, mental wellness plays a very crucial role.

o Talk to your Buddy
o Magic, the friendly bot     
o Therapy with your Coach 

Follow Us:
Web – https://feeljoy.in/
Blog - https://feeljoy.in/blog/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/feeljoy.in/
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/feeljoy.in/
Medium - https://medium.com/@feeljoy.in
Twitter – https://twitter.com/wefeeljoy?lang=en
Quora - https://www.quora.com/profile/Feel-Joy-1?ch=99&share=fa8b8d0e&srid=uBzYP
Mail - feeljoy.in@gmail.com 

Download FeelJoy, your mental wellness and mental and emotional wellbeing companion: Find your Buddy, your mental health companion. Let go of all those unhealthy coping mechanisms and start moving towards positive mental health.

title: Depression Elatoo - The Ultimate Happiness Guide
description:
The purpose of this app is to change the mood of users. Happiness and sadness are part of life but continues sadness leads to depression.

So if we remain sad for the longer period of time, the result will be depression. Almost every one of us will have to face sadness at some stage of our life. So the best thing which we can do to prevent depression is to stop this conversion of sadness into depression.
The meaning of depression is “the state of feeling very unhappy and without hope for the future” or “a mental illness in which a person is very unhappy or anxious for long periods and cannot have a normal life during periods” (Cambridge dictionary). 

Depression Elatto is small effort to prevent this conversion. This app has the following features.
1.	Breathing Exercise for Relaxation With Improved UI
2.	Very good collection of Quotes (More Number Of Quotes) 
3.	Very good collection of Jokes (More Number Of Jokes) 
4.	Quranic Meditation (More Quranic Verses)
5.	Depression Screening test

title: Bipolar Disorder
description: Bipolar disorder, previously known as manic depression, is a mental disorder that causes periods of depression and periods of elevated mood. The elevated mood is significant and is known as mania or hypomania, depending on its severity, or whether symptoms of psychosis are present. During mania, an individual behaves or feels abnormally energetic, happy, or irritable. Individuals often make poorly thought out decisions with little regard to the consequences. The need for sleep is usually reduced during manic phases. During periods of depression, there may be crying, a negative outlook on life, and poor eye contact with others. The risk of suicide among those with the illness is high at greater than 6 percent over 20 years, while self-harm occurs in 30–40 percent. Other mental health issues such as anxiety disorders and substance use disorder are commonly associated.
